cells.data: I fugure there should be some way of displaying some information without displaying it as a note. I decided to use the unix `.file` method. This means that any note with a tile that starts with `.` will not be displayed.

There are also special `.` files. in each notebook if there is a notebook named `.page` then it will be displayed as the main content of the notebook pages. If no `.page` note exists then it will just list out the detailed list of notes.
